text: Mario Cecchini (25 January 1933 - 13 January 2021) was an Italian Roman Catholic bishop. He became a priest in 1958. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Fano-Fossombrone-Cagli-Pergola from 1986 until his resignation in 1998. He was born in Arcevia, Italy. Cecchini died on 13 January 2021 from COVID-19 in Arcevia, aged 87.Diocese of Fano-Fossombrone- Cagli-Pergola ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Italy
title: Mario Cecchini
